sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import Link from 'next/link'; import OrderRecivedWrapper, { OrderRecivedContainer, OrderInfo, OrderDetails, TotalAmount, BlockTitle, Text, InfoBlockWrapper, InfoBlock, ListItem, ListTitle, ListDes, } from './OrderReceived.style'; import { FormattedMessage } from 'react-intl'; type OrderRecivedProps = {}; const OrderRecived: React.FunctionComponent = props => { return ( 1444 March 14, 2019 Rs 1,944.00 6 Items 1.00pm 10/12/19 90 Minute Express Delivery 1st Floor, House 149, Road-22, Mohakhali DOHS, Dhaka - North Rs 1,864.00 Cash On Delivery 10 Rs 1,874.00 ); }; export default OrderRecived;
